attributes.action: Remove the broadcasting rights for FA Cup matches and England Internationals from ITV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We prose that it would be in the public interest, that the BBC be granted sole, exclusive rights to all sporting events televised on terrestrial television.

ITV has shown itself to be utterly incapable of providing coverage of a standard that is acceptable in a modern, first world country - the fiasco of Wednesday night's 'missed goal' merely being the tip of the iceberg.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the Football Association.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
